Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.api

Interface ISoundEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
SoundEngineSpigot
public interface ISoundEngine
Represents an object that can play sounds.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    playSound(double x, double y, double z, IPWorld world, PSound sound, float volume, float pitch)
    Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.

    Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.

  • Method Details

    • playSound

      void playSound(IPLocation loc, PSound sound, float volume, float pitch)
      Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.
      Parameters:
      loc - The location of the sound.
      sound - The sound to play.
      volume - The volume
      pitch - The pitch

    • playSound

      void playSound(Vector3Di pos, IPWorld world, PSound sound, float volume, float pitch)
      Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the sound.
      world - The world of the position.
      sound - The sound to play.
      volume - The volume
      pitch - The pitch

    • playSound

      void playSound(Vector3Dd pos, IPWorld world, PSound sound, float volume, float pitch)
      Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the sound.
      world - The world of the position.
      sound - The sound to play.
      volume - The volume
      pitch - The pitch

    • playSound

      void playSound(double x, double y, double z, IPWorld world, PSound sound, float volume, float pitch)
      Play a sound for all players in a range of 15 blocks around the provided location.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the location.
      y - The y coordinate of the location.
      z - The z coordinate of the location.
      world - The world of the position.
      sound - The sound to play.
      volume - The volume
      pitch - The pitch
